python.title: Python Revision Tour
python.summary: This chapter revisits fundamental Python concepts including data types, operators, control structures, functions, strings, lists, dictionaries, and file handling. It serves as a refresher for core Python syntax and programming constructs before advancing to higher-level topics.
derivations: Execution flow of loops (for/while) with break/continue
Scope resolution in nested functions (local vs. global)
Memory allocation for mutable (lists) vs. immutable (tuples) objects
File read/write operations (with open() as file)
